instructions: Select one option for each of the following questions. If you agree strongly with the statement select 0. If you disagree strongly with the statement select 5.

questions.content: I do not have an unhealthy curiosity and I don’t like to show my ignorance by asking questions.
I find subjects like philosophy quit boring.
Who cares about the ‘why’ of things? I am only interested in the ‘how’ of things that I have to do
I do not like to poke my node into others affairs.
I really enjoy food, clothing, action films or competitive sports more than anything else
I feel quite comfortable without company
One cannot care for everyone. I care mainly for my family members and friends.
I am primarily intreseted in the usefulness of things
